pages.title: Soul Flames
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Soul Flames$() are items that are applicable to $(#033dfc)Vault Crystals$() via Anvils, applying the $(#033dfc)Afterlife$() modifier, which restores your $(#033dfc)Inventory upon death$() & removes the $(#033dfc)Chance for an Artifact$().

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Soul Flames$() are obtained either through crafting, or finding them inside the Vault inside $(#033dfc)Vault Chests$().
